title: Bonded warehouse entry and exit documents
dataVerified: Importer, bonded warehouse, customs entry, goods in/out, duty deferral
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Warehouse status (in-bond/released). Link to bonded warehouse operator system (importer and customs, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents bonded warehouse fraud (removing goods without duty payment). Domain binding verifies bonded warehouse operator. Customs compliance. Duty deferral verification. CBP audit trail.
